casebody.data:
State
v.
Arvin Roscoe Hayes 287P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 5, 2016 James R. Grant, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Hayes, Arvin Roscoe. Daniel Snipes Johnson, Special Deputy Attorney General, Tom Horner, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 5th of August 2016 by State of NC for Temporary Stay:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 5th of August 2016."
